title: Medicine
content: "You get sick. You go to doctor. The medication you receive has side effects. You take medication for that. You get addicted. They try to help you by giving you another pill. You are paying for all of this out of pocket because your insurance sucks. So you're financially strapped you're addicted and you're in pain. That's the reality of it. It's a cycle. No one is looking for a cure just something to take care of the symptoms no matter how temporary. It's sickening."
